abstract: An economist at the United Nations Development Program answers reader questions about how the recession is affecting the world’s poorest countries, and what can or should be done to help them.
snippet: An economist at the United Nations Development Program answers reader questions about how the recession is affecting the world’s poorest countries, and what can or should be done to help them.
lead_paragraph: Last week we asked you to submit questions for Pedro Conceição, director of the Office of Development Studies at the United Nations Development Program, the leading United Nations agency in the fight against poverty.

headline.main: U.N. Development Expert Pedro Conceição Answers Your Questions
